inn1.comm: nice bounce and carry straightaway, leaves the right hander and easily negotiated by Dilshan
gets bat on ball and thumps it hard down to mid-off
the first thwack of the tournament, full and outside the off stump, he gets enough power to push the ball past the covers, quick outfield
strays on the pads and the ball drops to the on side, now Jayasuriya on strike
kicks up a bit off the surface and importantly the batsman drops his glove and fends it off
just opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
hits a good length outside off and gets good bounce as well, tucked to the on side
gets across his stumps, hops at the crease and defends
you bowl it short and wide and he will punish you, he has to reach out a bit to make contact but he manages to clear cover and mid-off
he keeps it along the ground this time and finds the same gap between mid-off and cover, short and wide again from the bowler, safer shot
Parnell struggles with his line outside the off stump, this time he opts not to chase it
gets across and pats it to the off side for a easy single
squares him up with lateral movement outside the off stump, nervy moment for Dilshan as he hangs his bat out
hits the deck hard and Jayasuriya has to duck under that bouncer

first blood to Steyn, looked  quite straightforward, lands on middle and leg just short of a good length, the ball doesn't bounce as much and holds its line before thudding onto the pads, Jayasuriya tries to hit across the line but the ball skids and hits him plumb in front
hint of low bounce there outside off, safely left alone
thick outside edge and cries of 'catch it' but well past the reach of second slip
85 mph, Dilshja swishes at thin air outside the off stump, extra bounce and pace from Steyn
that was in the zone for Dilshan, overpitched outside the off stump and he gets his high backlift down and thumps it past the gap between mid-off and cover, Botha gives up the chase
lands outside the off stump and he safely shoulders arms
defends it back to the bowler and takes a stride out of his crease but his partner sends him back
moves across his stumps and leaves it to the keeper, good carry
82.3 mph, Sanga takes the aerial route as he shapes to cut, wide of backward point and down to third man who's a bit square
nice defensive shot on the backfoot
wide down the leg side and Dilshan tries to glance it down but misses
shoots up off the surface and he gets his body behind the ball and defends
lands it outside off and he gets behind the line and defends
86.4 mph, fuller in length and softly pushed to the covers
85.9 mph, just holds the length back a bit and Sanga taps it to the covers again
short and he shapes to pull but mistimes the shot, Amla does well to fall to his right at short square leg and cut it off
fires it outside off and the ball rushes through to Boucher
shows the full face of the bat and pushes it straight to cover
that's the Dilshan we know, he feasts on a short delivery which sits up well on the off stump, swings and gets enough elevation to clear midwicket
slides down the leg side and almost a wide
excellent stop by Duminy at cover point, that really sped off the Dilshan's bat when he came on the front foot to crash a half volley, the TV cameraman assumed it was a four
stays nicely behind the line and defends
that away swinger catches Dilshan off guard again, he gets across on the backfoot and withdraws the bat
knocks it down to mid-on and takes a chance with a single, the throw to the bowler's end is wide
swings it on the pads and Dilshan makes him pay, turns his wrists and flicks it wide of midwicket, this outfield's quick
that's an afternoon thrash, not too short but Dilshan improvises well, he gets in position early to pull and keeps it along the ground, bisects the gap between mid-on and midwicket
good length on the pads and worked to the on side
leaves the left-hander and he safely shoulders arms
85.7 mph, gets across his stumps and defends with soft hands
take that! Parnell lands it outside off and gets a hint of movement off the seam, Dilshan follows it and slashes it hard past backward point, third man was square but he too had no chance
attempts another thrash outside off but he finds backward point
he attempts his signature shot! Gets on his knee, takes his eye off the ball and cheekily scoops it over the keeper,  cant blame the bowler for that
short and knocked down to midwicket for a single
good length delivery wide of the off stump and he bends forward and plays a smart square drive past backward point
strays down the leg side and wide called
knocks it straight to square lg
shortish outside off and chopped hard down to cover
good length outside the off stump and defended firmly to the off side
gets across slightly, flicks his wrists and finds the space between mid-on and midwicket
that had elegance inscribed on it, not a bad delivery at all, good length on middle and off but Sanga gets across, flicks his wrists and times it crisply past the gap between square leg and midwicket
stays behind the line and defends
Kallis not bowling to his field there, the short fine leg was up but he strays on the pads, another effortless flick by Sanga finds the wide open spaces at fine leg
fires it on the blockhole outside off, too quick for Dilshan to dig it out
gets across his stumps, opens the face and gently dabs it to third man
gets across his stumps and times that punch so crisply wide of mid-on, more of a defensive push, van der Merwe has a bit of work to do
shuffles across to a delivery aimed on middle and leg and he gets his placement spot on, flicks and beats short fine leg and even deep square leg had no chance
favours the on side again but deep square leg picks it up
stays back and softly nudges it to the on side
shuffles across and flicks it straight to square leg
chases a delivery slightly wide of the off stump and square-drives it to backward point
short and the ball heads towards his face, he pulls but finds square leg
a little short of a length outside off and he slaps it down to point
slower delivery outside off and he opens the face of the bat and dabs it to third man
hesitation! Sanga flicks it towards midwicket and sets off but there's loads of confusion and he swivels and heads back, luckily the throw was wide of the stumps
good afternoon Sir Morkel, he bowls a friendly short delivery wide of the off stump and Dilshan slaps it over cover point, he'll play that with his eyes shut
he's not afraid to bang it in short, Dilshan swivels and pulls that bouncer down ton deep square leg
pushes it with a straight bat towards mid-off and sets off
slower delivery on the pads and he shuffles and flicks it down to square leg
fullish and wide outside the off stump, he leaves it alone
nice lateral movement away from the left-hander, he opts to let it go
slower delivery on the pads, he tries to flick it away a bit too early and the ball clips his pads and rolls away
pitched up and wide outside off, he gets forward and drives hard square of the wicket on the off side, beating Amla at cover point

unfortunate for Kallis, it's a bouncer and Dilshan shapes to play the pull too early, he edges the ball onto his helmet and the ball deflects and beats Boucher who falls to his right, no slip so that's four
slower ball and softly pushed to the covers
opens the face of the bat and works it to point
gives him the charge but Morkel drops it short and forces Sanga to check his shot, he clips it to Botha at square leg
poor delivery and Dilshan gives it the treatment, friendly long hop outside off and he lofts through the line and comfortably clears extra cover, that's his fifty! Off just 38 balls
good comeback by Morkel, bangs it in short outside off and gets it to fizz past Dilshan's gloves
driven well but straight to cover
it's an overstep! Fullish in length on middle and leg, he times the punch well and beats mid-on comfortably
Free Hit Dilshan stays at the crease, clears the back leg and clobbers a good length delivery over the deep midwicket rope, that's 16 off the over
gets across and defends softly to the off side
shuffles and nudges it easily to fine leg
angles it on middle and leg and he pushes it down to mid-off
thumped hard but straight to cover
angles it on middle and leg and he clips it firmly to midwicket
he punches it towards mid-off who's a bit deep and goes through for an easy single
drops it outside off, he makes a bit of room and dabs it to short third man
opens the face and glides it to short third man again
fired in quicker and flatter, the batsman tucks it towards square leg and sets off fast, that allows a second run, two fielders charge towards the ball but the batsmen are too quick
down the leg side and he attempts to sweep
oh dear he oversteps, Sanga pushes it down to mid-on for a single

Free Hit: Botha fires it towards the leg side and Sanga changes guard, bats like a right hander, exposes his stumps and scoops it down Steyn's throat at third man, if only that was a legitimate wicket for South Africa
glances it to deep square leg
flat and quick on off and middle, pushes it to long-off
drops it on a good length outside off, he gets across and punches it to midwicket
gets across and nudges it down to short fine leg
full on middle and leg and pushed through the line to long-on
makes a bit of room, waits for it to turn and punches it to sweeper cover
nudges it wide of short fine leg
tucks it to the on side for a single
flicks a full delivery straight to midwicket
knocks it with the turn just wide of short fine leg
goes back and across and defends with soft hands
gets forward and pushes a full delivery through the line to long-off
full and driven square on the off side, he retains the strike
gets forward and drives to Amla at sweeper cover
driven through the line down the ground to Steyn at long-on
skids through and beats the outside edge as he makes room to cut
good commitment from the bowler as he dives full length to his left and saves at least one run
low full toss outside off but he ends up pasting it straight to cover
full outside off and he finds cover again
tosses it up outside off but he tamely pushes it to cover
poor length, he drops it short and Sanga absolutely relishes that as he swivels and pulls it hard over deep square leg, two fielders in the deep can only watch that sail over the rope
pushed to long-on
pushed through the line to long-on
flighted on middle and leg and knocked down to long-on
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
full on middle and off and driven to long-on
pushed to cover
he fires that flat towards the leg side and I reckon he got an under edge down to fine leg, nope it hit the pads
tucked to midwicket for a single
gets forward and clips it to square leg
flighted down the leg side and knocked to square leg
drives on the up and Botha dives in desperation to his right to take it on the full
makes room and cuts down to short third man
comes round the wicket, gets forward and defends with a dead bat
shows the full face of the bat and drives to wide long-on
shuffles across, waits for the turn and easily tucks it behind square on the on side
flighted on middle stump, he makes room and cuts to sweeper cover
full on middle and leg and driven to long-on
quicker through the air and defended with a dead bat
gets beside the line and drives to the covers
shuffles across and clips it with soft hands to the on side
flighted on middle and leg, pushed through the line to long-on
gets forward and drives to cover
shows the full face and punches to long-on
gets forward and turns it to the on side
gets forward and drives to cover
drops it on a good length outside off, turns a bit, Dilshan makes room and places it to sweeper cover
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
knocks it down to point
full outside off and driven down the ground to long-on
clips it down to short midwicket
punches it on the up towards long-on, cries of 'catch it' but it was safe
punches it to long-off
punches it down to long-on and that's his fifty, steady as ever
goes on the backfoot and punches it to deep square leg
pushes it to the covers and yells at his partner to stay back
pushes it to the off side
tucks it to deep square leg
knocks it square on the off side for a single
shuffles and knocks it to the on side for a single
stays back and clips it to the on side
strays down towards the leg side and Dilshan is quick on the shot, gets on his knee to sweep and he finds the big gap at fine leg
gets forward and defends
works it through the line to deep midwicket, SL are really piling it on here
excellent placement, full outside off, Dilshan gets his high backlift down and manages enough power to crash that wide of long-off
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
full outside off, he gets on his knee and drives hard to sweeper cover
drops it a fraction short outside off, he makes room and slices it just wide of short third man, excellent placement again
down the leg side and he gets a faint trickle down to short fine leg, he charges to the other end and punches the air, that's his 3rd hundred! What a rollicking way to start the tournament
the bowling change does the trick! Comes round the wicket, Sangakkara is a little too early on the shot, he lobs a full delivery tamely back to Duminy, Sanga flings his bat away in frustration
full outside off and driven to cover
driven down the ground to long-off
stays back and punches it to long-on

misfield! And surprisingly it's de Villiers, Dilshan drives firmly and de Villiers lets that slip right past him as he dives to his left at cover, Amla at sweeper had no chance, it was hit very firmly

Another bowling change works! Terrible delivery but Steyn won't mind that one bit, bangs it in really short and wide outside off, Dilshan goes for the bait and upper cuts it straight to Morkel at third man, poor shot from the batsman but he's done his bit and the crowd will be disappointed to see him depart
greets the birthday boy with a bouncer which fizzes past his helmet, Samaraweera takes hisb eyes off the ball
stays beside the line and knocks it to point
cuts with a lot of conviction but he finds backward point
fires it outside the off stump and he watchfully lets it go
change of pace and almost a wide outside the off stump
full on middle and leg and pushed to the on side
gets across and tucks it to midwicket
slow through the air outside off, opens the face and nudges it to short third man
gets forward and drives to cover
pushes it to long-off and gets off the mark
a little short and he goes back and across and taps it towards mid-on for a single
nice sharp bouncer, forces the batsman to bend backwards and sway away
hits the deck hard, slower bouncer this time but the same result
he's really pounding the surface, this time Mahela swivels and pulls along the ground to deep square-leg
slower delivery but drifts really wide outside the off stump
stays behind the line and taps it to cover point
shuffles and works it to the on side
full outside off and driven down to long-off
stays back, waits for the turn and clips it to midwicket
goes back and across and stylishly whips it to midwicket
gets forward and easily squirts it to the off side
fires it towards the leg stump but the batsman makes room and manages to steer it to the covers the single
slow through the air and softly nudged to midwicket
shuffles and clips it to square leg
goes right across his stumps and clips it wide of short fine leg
commits to the front foot and glances it behind square on the on side
lovely timing and placement, Botha bowls it a bit flat outside off, Mahela stays beside the line and cuts crisply and finds the gap at sweeper cover, the fielder gives up
shuffles and nudges it to the on side
slow through the air and he defends with a dead bat
makes room and slashes it to sweeper cover
runs it down to deep square leg
gets forward and drives to sweeper cover
opens the face of the bat and drives, sweeper cover is the place to be, if you want some action
starts off with a loosener outside off, he opens the face and dabs it down to third man
fires it outside off and the batsman thumps it hard but finds cover
bouncer and hooked away, slight misfield at fine leg but it doesn't cost them an extra run
fullish on the off stump and pushed to mid-off
full and pushed to mid-on
pitches it up and Jayawardene bunts it down toward mid-off before calling loudly for the single, that's well run
short of a length outside leg stump, easy for Samaraweera to get the wrists into play and work the ball into the gap at square leg
better ball, much fuller as Parnell searches for the yorker, doesn't entirely find his placement but its a good ball that Jayawardene knocks back
back of a length outside off and he dabs it to cover for one
full on the stumps and he clips the ball to midwicket
back of a length, angling across, he thinks about turning the ball across the way but it gains on him so he defends it back
moves right across his stumps and nudges it down to deep square leg and some agile fielding in the deep limits that to a single
short on the body and clubbed away behind square on the on side, Steyn dives in desperation at fine leg, lands on his left shoulder and nearly loses his pants on the slide
nearly lobs it back to the bowler on the full, kallis falls to his left and cuts it off
pushes it towards point for a single
short again and Samaraweera gets a faint touch, Steyn does the fielding at fine leg
opens the face and glides it behind square on the off side
streaky as streaky can get, he gets a thin inside edge which nearly shaves the off stump and beats the keeper

top class cricket, Mahela clips it away behind square on the on side and timing is crisp, kallis runs across from deep midwicket, slides and in one motion relays the ball to Botha, limits that to a couple
bowls it on the blockhole and he squirts it out to short fine leg
low full toss and he squeezes it out to long-off
slower delivery  and short down the leg side, he pulls it to fine leg
gives him the charge, checks his shot and clips it to the on side
fires it down the leg side, he works it to the deep on the on side
makes room and chops it just wide of short third man, it brings up the 50 stand
flighted on middle and leg, he gets on his knee and sweeps to fine leg
starts off the new spell with a yorker down the leg side and a faint touch is enough to take it all the way to fine leg
keeps it on the pads and he pushes it through the line to long-on
full on middle and leg and firmly punched with a flick of the wrists to long-on
opens the face and dabs it down to third man
punched off the full face of the bat but he cannot pierce the off side field
tucked to short midwicket and they scamper through for the run, the throw hits the batsman and deflects and nearly reaches the boundary
flighted on middle and off and nudges it away wide of fine leg
tossed up outside off and scooped towards long-off
makes room and cuts hard square of the wicket on the off side and nearly finds the boundary at deep cover
comes down the track and fails to put away a full toss
moves across his stumps and works it down to fine leg
he makes room and waltzes down the track but he swishes at thin air, the ball misses the leg stump
excellent improvisation, the batsman knows the fine leg is up so he moves across and paddle scoops a length delivery well over the reach of short fine leg
digs out a yorker to short extra cover and the fielder dives, cuts it off and has a shy at the striker's end, there's hesitation in the running but the batsman is sent back
slower ball and he opens the face of the bat and steers him down to third man
tries to nurdle it to the on side but the ball clips his pads and drops in front of him, they pick up a quick single
slow bouncer and he hops and helps it on its way to fine leg

opportunity missed! Mahela drops it wide of the wicketkeeper and sets off for a non-existent single, Boucher has a shy at the batsman's end after Mahela turns around, a direct hit would have sent him back
he bowls a friendly long hop outside off and Mahela merely scoops him through the line and clears wide long-off
short outside off and he runs it down to third man
banged in short and he swivels and pulls over midwicket, the ball drops in the middle of nowhere
starts off with a full delivery which the batsman pushes down the ground to wide long-off
pushes a low full toss to Duminy at mid-off and takes a risk with the single but gets away as his throw misses the stumps at the bowler's end
nothing's going right for SA, he oversteps and Samaraweera flicks it straight to Kallis at fine leg who hops and takes the catch
Free Hit Another catch...for nothing! Makes a bit of room and whacks it straight to Smith at midwicket, he hurls the ball back to Parnell who whips off the bails but the batsman is home
yorker length on middle and leg, he squirts it out to the on side
artistry from Mahela! He goes right across his stumps, exposes all three and paddle flicks a full delivery from outside off and neatly bisects the gap between square leg and short fine leg
now he bowls a full toss and gets punished to the same region at fine leg, Mahela pulls over the fielders
short and wide outside off and he makes room and upper cuts down to third man
terrible delivery, he digs it really short and wide outside the off stump, he reaches out and slashes it over backward point
he scoops it away through the line and the ball drops short of mid-off
short again and he chops it down to point
they're having a ball in the Powerplay! Steyn aims for the yorker but he bowls a friendly full toss which Mahela scoops over extra cover
on the blockhole and he squirts it out to the off side
low full toss wide outside off and the batsman chases that , gets a thick outside edge to third man
moves right across his stumps and aims to paddle scoop it over fine leg but he ends up pushing it back to the bowler
fires it on a fullish length on middle and off, Mahela makes a bit of room to deposit it over cover but he doesn't get the timing right and Duminy runs to his left at extra cover and takes the catch

he's on a hat-trick! Samaraweera goes across his stumps and tries to whip him over square leg but he gets a leading edge which swirls in the air for quite a few agonising seconds, van der Merwe sprints from third man and judges the catch well
could have been a wicket, had the leading edge taken the aerial route, nevertheless Mathews manages to squirt it past point
low full toss and he tucks it down to long-on
well bowled, exerts himself and digs it in on a good length, the batsman barely had time to decide what to play so he settled on fending it off back to the bowler
fizzes past the outside edge, he can't make contact
digs it in short and he swivels and pulls it away down to deep square leg
makes room and cracks it to the covers and a misfield costs a few extra runs
turning out to be a good over, steep bouncer outside off and Kandamby's upper cut doesn't turn out right, places it straight to third man
fires it full and Mathews moves across and glances it down to short fine leg, good fielding
fires it on the blockhole on middle and leg, he clips it away but finds midwicket
makes room to smash that anywhere but the ball hits the toe end of the bat and rolls to the off side
full and pushed down the ground to long-on
that's more like it! Parnell makes the mistake of pitching it up outside off and Kandamby clears his back leg, makes room and creams it past the gap between cover and extra cover
good comeback, changes the pace and Kandamby doesn't read it, makes room and he's beaten
catching practice, Parnell pitches it up on middle and leg and Kandamby flicks his wrists and clips it straight to Duminy at midwicket, didn't get the required elevation
Mathews struggles continue against Steyn, the ball fizzes past the outside edge outside off
bangs it in short and he bends forward slightly and pulls to the deep
strays on the pads and he times the flick well but finds deep square leg

makes room and slaps it down to long-on, the ball reaches van der Merwe on the first bounce and he hurls the throw back to Steyn who whips off the bails, Kulasekara dives in vain and the 3rd umpire takes a look
short and he flat-bats it down to long-off
Mathews makes room to squeeze out a yorker but the ball screeches through and pegs back the leg stump

inn2.comm: lands outside off and Smith ends up chopping it down the pitch
89.5 mph, nice indrift into the left-hander, Smith gets his bat nicely behind it to defend
uses his wrists and easily clips it past the gap between midwicket and mid-on
just a little slower in pace and he gets forward and drives to cover
thick outside edge but very well placed indeed, he makes use of the pace and width outside off and places it well wide of first slip
chopped hard onto the turf and the ball bobs up to Dilshan at backward point who leaps backwards and stops it
hits a good length on middle and leg and Amla clips it with the angle to fine leg
lands it on a good length outside off and Smith punches it wide of cover for a single
grants him width outside off and he shapes to cut but chops it down to backward point
cuts back in a bit off the seam and safely defended
gets beside the line and makes use of the fraction of width to cut it straight to third man
lands it wide outside off and Smith safely lets it go
loosener outside off and Amla punches it to the covers
firm backfoot punch down the pitch and Mathews saves a couple of runs thans to an athletic dive to his right
shuffles and clips it away to midwicket
full outside off and he gets beside the line and drives to cover point
good fielding again by Mathews, he intercepts a punched drive off the front foot
played on! Mathews bowls it outside off and gives the batsman a fraction of width, Amla slashes away from his body and chops it onto his stumps, the leg stump goes for a tumble
The ball climbs on him a bit, he stays back and defends
moves right across his stumps and clips it to square leg
angles it away from the left-hander and Smith follows the movement and defends to the off side
on the pads, he shuffles and clips it to deep midwicket
the ball cuts back on off the seam and Smith plays one of his favourite shots - the flick - and bisects the gap at square leg, this outfield is quick
keeps a bit low but Kallis manages to get behind the line to defend
gives him width outside off, he reaches out and steers it to third man
bowls a nice stump to stump line and Smith covers the line and defends down the track
he holds the length back and Smith gets his bat nicely behind the line and punches the ball down towards mid-off
shuffles and clips it down to midwicket to rotate the strike
Smith drives off the front foot but doesn't time it very well, he also places it straight to mid-off

elegance from Kallis, he pitches it up outside off and it lands on the right spot for Kallis who bends his knee slightly and caresses it past the covers, stand and deliver, he didn't have to move an inch out of his crease
fullish outside off and driven to cover point
gets to the pitch of the ball and punches it just wide of mid-off
shows the full face of the bat and drives straight back to the bowler
excellent shot, he favours the on side this time, a half volley drifting on the pads is punished with style and panache, picks the big gap between midwicket and mid-on with ease
stays beside the line and drives to the off side
Mathews flings himself to his right and tries to intercept a firm straight drive
fullish in length on middle and leg, he works it down to mid-on
he punishes another leg stump half volley, this time he works it just wide of mid-on, the follow through was perfect
drives through the line straight to mid-on
punches it straight to short cover
holds the length back outside off, Kallis defends
stays back and punches it back down the pitch
walks across his stumps and gets a thin outside edge down to third man
gets to the pitch of a full ball and drives straight to short point
another well-timed drive off the front foot but he places it straight to extra cover
Kula keeps it tight on the off stump, Kallis gets forward and defends with a dead bat
Kallis has decided he has had enough, he states his intentions clear by charging down the pitch and pasting a length delivery over extra cover, couple of bounces and four
pushes it very firmly back to the bowler, Mathews has had to do a lot of fielding off his own bowling
full outside off, Smith takes a couple of paces down the pitch and crashes that past mid-off and cover
forget about chasing that as well, he shuffles across his stumps early to disturb the bowler's rhythm and then punches a full delivery on the up past mid-off
tries to dab it down to third man but misses
run-out opportunity! Smith deftly dabs it down to point where Dilshan dives and hurls the throw to the keeper, Smith scampers back
twinkle toes Smith again! He first makes room before coming down the track and slashing Kulasekara over backward point, his placement was perfect
and once again Smith tries to angle it down to third man and misses
Kulasekara makes the mistake by dropping it short, the friendly length allows Smith time to swivel and biff it over deep square leg, flat six
now he bowls it fuller and Smith gets forward and pushes it through the line off the sweet spot, beats both silly mid-off and the conventional mid-off
pushes it down to extra cover
opens the face of the bat and pushes it to point
lands it on middle and leg, he punches it down to mid-on
just opens the face of the bat and squeezes it down to cover
reaches out to drive a full delivery but he ends up mistiming it to mid-off
goes for a booming extra cover drive on the up but misses it completely, how close was that to the outside edge?
almost an action replay, seems like Kallis has suddenly lost sight of that off stump
hits a good length outside off and he firmly punches it down to mid-off
deliberate but not good enough to fetch him a boundary, deftly angled away to third man, plays very close to the body
makes room to a full and wide delivery, he ends up chopping it down to mid-off
gets beside the line and taps it straight to Dilshan at backward point
fullish in length outside off and driven down to sweeper cover
Smith tries to break the shackles by shuffling across his stumps but Kula slips it wide outside off and Smith fails to get bat on ball
driven hard but straight to cover
bowls a nice tight line and Kallis defends with soft hands
grants him a bit of width and Kallis hits it hard but finds cover
pierces the gap on the off side but the sweeper mops up
bowls him a friendly half volley and Kallis gets under the bounce and lofts through the line over mid-off, not that well timed to reach the boundary
the slower ball but it's a fraction short, he makes room and times that crisply just wide if mid-off's reach
this time he decides to go over mid-on, stays at the crease and tries to take him downtown but the ball stops towards the boundary, Malinga does the fielding
tossed up on middle and leg, he works it down to midwicket

excellent timing! Tossed up on middle and leg, Smith gets to the pitch of the ball and crisply forces it away past midwicket, there was a fielder art deep midwicket but the quick outfield carried the ball through
now he gets on his knee and sweeps and connects well, beats short fine leg
tucks it to square leg for a single
shuffles and clips it away down to fine leg

hits the timber first ball! Smith is still puzzled, it's the legbreak which pitches on leg and skids through, Smith gets forward but leaves a gap between bat and pad, the ball clips his pad and takes out the leg stump
lands on middle and leg and he works it to the on side
fullish outside off and punched towards cover point
stays beside the line and he pushes it to the off side
full on the offstump and he makes a bit of room and pushes it to mid-off
full outside off and driven to mid-off
comes round the wicket, gets forward and defends to the off side
defends off his pads perhaps outside the line of the off stump, stifled appeal from Murali
nudges it against the turn to the on side
tossed up on middle and leg and tucked away to fine leg
once again defended off the pads outside the line of the off stump
Murali keeps it tight agai, AB gets forward and defends
Kallis fails to pick the carrom ball, goes for a extravagant drive and nearly gets an under edge to the keeper
stays beside the line and knocks it down to point
opens the face of the bat and glides it down to gully
skids off the surface and he clips it down to midwicket
he punches it firmly to mid-off and sets off for a risky run, the fielder decides not to have a shy at the stumps
gets his frint pad across and elegantly flicks him over midwicket
Dropped AB comes down the pitch and chips him across the line, Dilshan doesn't time his jump at midwicket, can call it a chance
tries to dab it down to third man but the ball straightens before reaching the keeper
he flicks it down to deep midwicket
gets forward and pushes it to midwicket
flighted on the leg side and pushed to short midwicket
Skids through and he clips it to the on side
defends with sot hands and thinks of setting off for a quick single but Sanga's flick misses the stumps and they get an overthrow
flighted delivery on the middle and leg, Kallis clips it to deep mid wicket
turns it to the on side with the spin
takes a quick single to short fine leg
he fires this one much quicker, AB punches it firmly and beats the bowler
gets forward to a full delivery and pushes it to long-off
stays back and defends with a dead bat
gets forward and smothers the spin
shuffles and works it to midwicket

sharp catch! Mendis floats it outside off and Kallis lunges forward to drive, he spoons it in the air low towards mid-off and Mathews moves to his right, times his dive perfectly and takes it airborne, throws his arms up in celebration

he's on a hat-trick! Mendis bowls the flipper on off and middle, Duminy comes forward to block it but like Smith leaves a gap between bat and pad, the inside edge cannons onto the leg stump which tumbles backwards
pushed through quicker on middle and off, Boucher tucks it to the on side
this one skids through and nearly takes the outside edge to the keeper
appeal! He lunges forward to a delivery bowled from round the wicket, hits him outside the line
elegantly whipped away high in the air over midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, he gets forward and turns it to fine leg
flighted on middle and leg, de Villiers comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long-on
stays back and glances it to fine leg
Dropped Looked like the flipper again, Boucher stays back and the outside edge travels quickly, too quick for Mahela at first slip to get a hand to it
lighted on middle and leg, Boucher defends it to the leg side
very nearly hits the timber again, this one sneaks past the outside edge and the stumps
drives square of the wicket on the off side to sweeper cover
gets forward and drives to long-off
stays back, waits for the turn and the inside edge rolls off his pads to the off side
chance! Turns it towards short square leg and sets off for a single, a better throw to the bowler's end would have had him in trouble
flighted on middle and leg, de Villiers comes on the frontfoot and drives to long-on
flighted outside off, he reaches forward and drives square of the wicket on the off side
this one skids through towards the off stump and AB opens the face of the bat and glances it towards short third man
he prefers staying rooted to the crease, another one skids through and he clips it to midwicket
short of a length on the off stump, he steers it towards point
he fires a low full toss close to the leg stump and he squeezes it out to short fine leg
lands outside off, he chops it to the off side
bangs it in short outside off, he goes for the upper cut but importantly keeps it down and the ball drops in front of point
reaches forward and drives towards cover
gets forward and squeezes it past slip
this one turns back in from outside off, nearly gets an inside edge onto his pads
Boucher closes the face of the bat and glances it to deep square-leg
gets on the front foot and drives to long-on
shuffles and clips it to fine leg
bangs it in on a good length and he gets beside the line and just manages to squeeze it past a diving backward point
Malinga bangs it in short and de Villiers decides to slam him across the line, he swings too early and gets a thick top edge, Jayawardene pedals backwards at midwicket and takes the skier
hits the deck hard and Boucher gets underneath the bouncer
teases him with the slower bouncer this time outside the off stump, Boucher didn't pick that
stays beside the line and steers him to the off side
bowls the off cutter and Boucher doesn't offer a shot
floated up on the stumps and he stabs it back
cuts it from close to his body and short third man picks up
tossed up on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
comes forward and defends to the off side, then thinks about the run but Boucher wisely shoos him back
good bowling, this one is flatter, pitches outside leg stump and turns and Morkel gets well forward to watchfully defend
gives it some air, gets it to dip, Morkel starts using his feet and clips it wide of mid-on for a single
slinging yorker hurled down on the pads, clipped sweetly into the gap at square leg for a single
bang, thats four! Malinga errs in length and Boucher spots the short ball, hammering it from outside off stump with tremendous power, beats the fielders

is that a catch put down? Yes it is, but what an effort by Dilshan at backward point! Boucher slaps a short ball in the air with power, Dilshan anticipated it superbly and flings himself to his left, sticking a hand out, but can't hold on
back of a length, he goes back and punches down the ground
slower ball, fuller too, Boucher is early into his shot and chips the ball in the air but it drops well in front of Murali, deep at mid-on
pitches it up, Morkel runs it down to third man for one
back of a length outside off, Morkel mistimes the cut shot
top shot, just leans into the marginally fuller ball and drives that on the rise past a diving cover fielder
shorter in length, sits up and surprises Morkel, who gets up and plays the ball down softly in front of the off-side ring
not enough room to free the arms, so Morkel allows the ball come onto him and then runs it off the cramped face of the bat just wide of the man at point
pitches it up, a wee bit wide and Boucher cuts well into the gap
too wide, its the slower one, but Morkel cuts straight to point
its short and Boucher takes his eyes off the ball as he shapes to pull, the ball rolls past square leg
fires it on a fullish length on the off stump and Morkel punches it away to mid-off
aims for the blockhole outside off and Morkel manages to squirt it out to backward point
really cramps him up for room with that dead straight middle-stump line, he can only -push it back to the bowler
similar line and length and Morkel improvises by flicking his wrists and placing it wide of mid-on
slower ball outside the off stump and Boucher knocks it down to backward point
fullish in length outside off and pushed through the line to long-off

Boucher takes the risk of shuffling too far across his stumps, he tries to nudge it down to fine leg but the ball lands just outside the line of the off stump, moves in and clips his pads, replays showed that it would have hit the stumps, Taufel thinks for a few seconds and raises the finger
gets off the mark with a streaky boundary, gets a thick inside edge to fine leg while trying to slash through the off side
drives firmly off the front foot and finds cover
lands outside off and Botha tries to slash it through the off side but the ball creeps through low and misses the under edge
fullish on middle and leg and he works it to midwicket
gets forward and pushes it down the track
pushed to mid-on, the fielder dives and deflects it to mid-off
fullish on middle and off, he digs it out and the ball beats Kulasekara
too full and wide outside the off stump, Morkel doesn't offer a shot
full on middle and off, he mistimes the drive to mid-off
fires it full on the off stump line and Botha digs it out firmly to mid-on
persists with the yorker length outside off, he gets forward and jams it out to mid-off
that would have felt good, pitched up on middle and leg, Botha has a free swing of the arms and carts the ball over wide mid-on, one bounce and four
stays beside the line and he steers it to point
that's a good bouncer, on the off stump and Botha drops his gloves to take evasive action
drops it short of a length, he swivels and pulls to fine leg
that carrom ball completely squares him up, beats the outside edge and the off stump
he's gutsy enough to play the reverse sweep, but he can't beat the diving fielder at backward point
skids through and Morkel steers it down to cover point
pitches on the off stump line and Morkel makes room, clears the front leg and biffs it past the bowler
he waltzes down the track and changes his mind on the shot, he slashes and gets an outside edge which nearly runs to the third man boundary,  Malinga does well to pull it back
steers it down to backward point
take that! Malinga spears that full outside the off stump, Morkel makes room for himself and plays a forceful square drive past backward point, beats all the blue shirts there
Botha picks the slower ball and takes him downtown, he picks it from off stump and lofts him over midwicket, the ball lands just inches before the rope
I spoke too soon, he bangs in a bouncer and Taufel signals a wide
the crowd get excited, Malinga bowls the offcutter, lands outside the off stump and Botha flashes hard and the outside edge beats the keeper
that extra ball has yielded a wicket, Malinga lands it on a fullish length outside off, Botha shapes to scoop it over mid-off but the ball dips and lands down to Marthews' throat at mid-off
full toss and Morkel fails to put it away
plays all around it, the ball clips his pads and rolls away
strays down the leg side and wide called
very slow through the air, the off cutter, he gets forward and defends
drops it short, waits for it to turn in before clubbing it wide of midwicket
gets beside the line and pushes it towards point
aims for the blockhole outside off and Morkel creams it down the ground to long-off
short of a length and van der Merwe stays at the crease and clips it down to square leg
fullish in length on the off stump and he drives to long-off
stays back and tucks it back to the bowler
